attributes.action: stop spending excessive amounts of money on swine flu warning campaigns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are all aware of swine flu and its potential dangers. We all understand how to wipe our nose and wash our hands. This advice is nothing new. The amount of money spent informing the public of common sense is now starting to become a joke. 

We request, and require, that the PM takes the appropriate action to fund our economy, support those unemployed, the health service and pensioners rather than spending any more money on this advertising campaign.
